page.title: 02Parish Council & Community
page.content: A little less than two years ago the Parish Council, by cooperating with the Essex County Council Education Department provided a new village hall. A new enlarged school hall was built and when the school doesn't need it the village can use it. One major draw-back of the shares scheme is that daytime activities are still carried out in an extremely run-down community centre in the village as the school hall is not available during school day. These activities involve usually the old and also various pre-school organisations: for example the Old Folks Club, the playgroup and 'Mums and Toddlers'.
